title: WTT: Keeler Port for Other HOFer/SLer/Off Back
author: wazoo

posts.post_title: WTT: Keeler Port for Other HOFer/SLer/Off Back
posts.post_content:
Going to try to leave this post pretty general and see what bites I get. Recently picked up this solid front Keeler port and would like to trade for a comparable HOFer, Old Mill Southern Leaguer, or back that isnt Piedmont or Sweet Cap. 

Shoot me an email at [url]wazywhoa@gmail.com[/url] for pictures. Thanks.
The "Wee" Willie Keeler Portrait card is amongst my favorites. Just to own a Hall of Famer card (wearing a New York Highlanders uniform) is COOL.
